pages.text: During the first nights in this new world you lit your improvised hut with torches. As atmospheric as that was, it was also one thing: primitive.$(br)To turn away from your dark, torch-lit past, you designed lamps based on Shimmerstone.$()

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: You can use $(l:decoration/block_variants)Polished Basalt$(), $(l:decoration/block_variants)Polished Calcite$(), $(item)Smooth Stone$(), $(item)Polished Deepslate$(), $(item)Polished Diorite$(), $(item)Polished Andesite$() or $(item)Polished Granite$() as a base.
Blackslag can be used, too, resulting in a especially dark variant.
